entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
